note:
👋 Hewwo! I’m a 25-year-old trans girl from Argentinya, and I’m happily taken by my really cute partner, @xerz@fedi.xerz.one! 💖

I believe in a world where everynyan is equal and free ✊ I’m a programmer 👩‍💻 who loves @gnome@floss.social. Right now, I’m working on a super cute app called "Replay" to help you keep up with your fave content creators! 🌟

🎮 I’m a casual gamer, and here’s what I’m playing:

• 🎮 Zenless Zone Zero
• 🗡️ The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds

📺 And I’m totally obsessed with anime! Here’s what I’m watching:

• 🏴‍☠️ One Piece (currently at Dressrosa)
• 🍭 Oniichan wa Oshimai!
• 🐉 Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken (currently at the third season)
• 🐲 Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon
• 🌟 JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken (currently at Stone Ocean)
• ⚔️ Berserk
• 💖 Ijiranaide, Nagatoro-san 2nd Attack
• 🔥 Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

🦄 My Little Pony fan here! 💕 Raridash is the best ship, don’t you think?

Oh, and if you happen to remember my previous accounts, I was just a shy little caterpillar 🐛 waiting to become a butterfly! 🦋

✨ I’d love to accept follow requests from those who vibe with me! Just a little heads up—please have some posts and a bio, or I might have to pass!
